name: vlayer-web-proof
description: Web proof generation using TLS Notarization (TLSN) technology, created from vlayer repository.

scripts.build: bun run build:rust && tsc && bun run copy:native
scripts.copy:native: cp ../rust/target/release/libvlayer_web_proof.so ./vlayer-web-proof.linux-x64-gnu.node && cp vlayer-web-proof.linux-x64-gnu.node dist/ && cp vlayer-web-proof.linux-x64-gnu.node dist/src/
scripts.dev: bun run build && bun run dist/index.js

author: vlayer
